page.title: 09Home Life in Eglwysbach
page.content: I live on a farm. It has a slate roof and the house is built of stone. The house is about 450 years old and has five rooms. It is about three miles from the village and I get a lift to school from our next door neighbour. My hobby is riding a motor bike and sometimes I go around the sheep with it. In our family there are three of us, dad, mam and I. We have three pet dogs. I like playing football and when I go home from school I help my dad. Then I do my homework. Sometimes I stay with my friend in the village to play instead of going home and then my mother comes to fetch me before it gets dark.
